message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing further if needed.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in this product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position.  While the product is truly exceptional, I could meet you at $1,350,000. This is taking into account the inherent value and potential it holds.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000. Can you consider this price?
